Translations.Text: Lutacya janasamuhanehi paigambaranna khote tharavile
Jevha tyanca bha'u luta yanni tyanna sangitale ki kaya tumhi allahace bhaya nahi balagata
Mi tumacyakade visvasta rasula (paigambara) ahe
Tevha tumhi allahace bhaya rakha ani majhe ajnapalana kara
Ani mi tumacyakaduna yabaddala konatahi mobadala magata nahi, majhya mobadalyaci jababadari kevala sarva visvancya palanakartyavara ahe
Kaya tumhi jagatalya lokampaiki purusanjavala jata
Ani tumacya jya striyanna allahane tumaci patni banavile ahe tyanna soduna deta, khari gosta asi ki tumhi ahataca maryada olandanare
(Tyanna) uttara dile ki he luta! Jara tu he thambavale nahisa tara avasya tula bahera kadhale ja'ila
(Luta) mhanale, mi tumacya acaranane agadi aprasanna ahe
He majhya palanakartya! Mala ani majhya kutumbala ya (kukarma) pasuna vacava, je he karita aheta
Yastava amhi tyanna ani tyancyasi sambandha (nate) asalelya sarvanna vacavile
Eka vrd'dha strikherija ki ti mage rahanaryampaiki jhali
Maga amhi itara sarvanna nasta karuna takale
Ani amhi tyancyavara eka khasa prakaraca pa'usa padala. To motha va'ita pa'usa hota, jo khabaradara kelya gelelya lokanvara padala
Nihsansaya, yatahi mothi nisani ahe, parantu tyancyapaiki adhikansa loka imana rakhanare navhate
Nihsansaya, tumaca palanakartaca varcasvasali, daya karanara ahe
Eyakavalyannihi paigambaranna khote tharavile
Jevha (paigambara) su'aiba tyanna mhanale, kaya tumhi allahace bhaya nahi rakhata
Mi tumacyakade visvasta paigambara ahe
Tevha tumhi allahace bhaya rakha, ani majhe ajnapalana kara
Ani mi tyabaddala tumacyakaduna kasalyahi mobadalyaci apeksa karita nahi. Majhya mobadalyaci jababadari tara sarva visvancya palanakartyara ahe
Mapa - tola purepura kara ani kami denaryammadhye samila ho'u naka
Ani sarala (ucita) tarajune tola karuna dya
Ani lokanna tyancya vastu kami karuna de'u naka ani (nirbhaya ho'una) dharativara utpata (phasada) majavita phiru naka
